thread.title: Windows 10 Mobile Build 10572 brings Cortana improvements and Skype integration
thread.title_full: Windows 10 Mobile Build 10572 brings Cortana improvements and Skype integration

title: Windows 10 Mobile Build 10572 brings Cortana improvements and Skype integration
text:
Windows 10 Mobile Build 10572 brings Cortana improvements and Skype integration 
The Inquirer Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
moved a step closer this week with the release of Build 10572 to 'Fast Ring' subscribers on the Windows Insider programme. 
The new build includes a bug seen in the previous version which means that the only way to install it is to roll back to Windows Phone 8.1 and then update. This has been promised as a fix in the forthcoming 10575, but for now it's up to you. 
So why release it? Funny you should ask because...
